ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | oppgbas.1 | |- O = ( oppG ` R ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_oppgmnd | |- ( R e. Mnd -> O e. Mnd ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppG ` O ) = ( oppG ` O ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_oppgmnd | |- ( O e. Mnd -> ( oppG ` O ) e. Mnd ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_oppgbas | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` O ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_oppgbas | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` ( oppG ` O ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_a1i | |- ( T. -> ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` ( oppG ` O ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( T. -> ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` O ) = ( +g ` O ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` ( oppG ` O ) ) = ( +g ` ( oppG ` O ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 3, 11 | #P_oppgplus | |- ( x ( +g ` ( oppG ` O ) ) y ) = ( y ( +g ` O ) x ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` R ) = ( +g ` R ) |
| 14 | 13, 1, 10 | #P_oppgplus | |- ( y ( +g ` O ) x ) = ( x ( +g ` R ) y ) |
| 15 | 12, 14 | #P_eqtri | |- ( x ( +g ` ( oppG ` O ) ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` R ) y ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( T. /\ ( x e. ( Base ` R ) /\ y e. ( Base ` R ) ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` ( oppG ` O ) ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` R ) y ) ) |
| 17 | 8, 9, 16 | #P_mndpropd | |- ( T. -> ( ( oppG ` O ) e. Mnd <-> R e. Mnd ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_trud | |- ( ( oppG ` O ) e. Mnd <-> R e. Mnd ) |
| 19 | 4, 18 | #P_sylib | |- ( O e. Mnd -> R e. Mnd ) |
| 20 | 2, 19 | #P_impbii | |- ( R e. Mnd <-> O e. Mnd ) |
